content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions for assembly.

Analysis of Main Target Image:
- The structure has 4 green rectangular blocks and 1 orange cylindrical block
- It has 3 distinct layers:
  * Bottom: One horizontal green block as base
  * Middle: One orange vertical cylinder
  * Top: Three green blocks forming a U-shape (one horizontal and two vertical)

Block Selection from Dictionary:
- Base: Block #1 (horizontal green rectangle)
- Middle: Block #7 (vertical orange cylinder)
- Top U-shape:
  * Horizontal part: Block #1 (same as base)
  * Two vertical parts: Block #3 (vertical green rectangle) x2

Assembly Order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (base)
    Step2: Move block with index 7 (orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (horizontal top connector)
    Step4: Move block with index 3 (left vertical piece)
    Step5: Move block with index 3 (right vertical piece)
}

This will create the exact structure shown in the target image, maintaining all the correct orientations and spatial relationships between blocks.
